AUSTIN, TEXAS- ONSITE ONLY- TECHNICAL ARCHITECT Interview process: Recruiter PS, Coding test, SME PS, Onsite

WP Engine is seeking a Technical Architect to help lead our strategic initiatives for our Research and Development organization.

WP Engine powers amazing digital experiences built on WordPress. With over 36 million visitors a day across more than 300,000 WordPress sites, our content management platform elevates WordPress into a really easy to use, secure and scalable solution. Our services reach everyone from the individual blogger to a large enterprise marketer. We are a disruptive force in the WordPress platform sector because we combine this robust, easy-to-use open source technology with enterprise grade tools, applications and expertise.
